metadata.description: Ever try to wrangle an illiterate, 30-foot tall rock monster away from his 5-year-old best friend? Or calm down a 400 pound muscle-man rag-doll during her daily temper-tantrum?  For Dave and Terry, it's all in a day's work.  As agents for I.M.A.G.I.N.E., they are responsible for keeping your imaginary friends in-line...
metadata.name: Imagine Agents
